# Chat Logger (Simple and FULL) - by Njna_Grimsdottir

## Description
This one writes 2 files out containing ALL available incoming chat data, and a simple version with name/date/content, that I use for tracking and have some other actions that parse the files as they are updated for real-time statistics.

## Installation

Copy the text from the code box below into the `Import` box in Streamer.bot to add these to your action library:

```

```

## Configuration

Just tie the `Action` `ChatLogger` to the `Chat Message` `Event`.

![chat-logger-event.png](/examples/chat-logger-event.png)
